text: Jitbahadur Muktan (born 31 August 1979) is a male Nepalese recurve archer. He competed in the archery competition at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro. He is a member of the Manang Marshyangdi Archery Team based in Kathmandu.https://thehimalayantimes.com/sports/jit-bahadur-moktan-bags-three- golds/ ==References== ==External links== * Category:Nepalese male archers Category:Living people Category:1979 births Category:Archers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic archers of Nepal Category:Archers at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Archers at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Nepal
title: Jit Bahadur Muktan
